Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What is the purpose of the Singapore-IEA Regional Training Programme on Seizing Opportunities with Regional Power Grids?
answers: The purpose of the training programme is to enhance capabilities in regional power grids and discuss the potential of regional power grids.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: Who are the participants of the Singapore-IEA Regional Training Programme?
answers: The participants include policymakers, regulators, utilities, and the industry.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: According to the Southeast Asia Energy Outlook 2022, how can regional integration and multilateral power trading benefit power systems?
answers: Regional integration and multilateral power trading can enhance power systems flexibility and accelerate renewable energy projects.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What is the focus of the training programme in terms of cross-border electricity trading?
answers: The training programme aims to share best practices and expertise in cross-border electricity trading, including the development of subsea interconnectors.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What are the goals of the collaboration between Singapore's Energy Market Authority and the International Energy Agency?
answers: The collaboration aims to facilitate decarbonization, enhance energy resilience, and improve access to energy in the region.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What does the IEA emphasize regarding the power systems in Southeast Asia?
answers: The IEA emphasizes the need for further integration of national power systems in Southeast Asia to meet rising electricity demand with renewables in a cost-effective and sustainable manner.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: When will the Singapore-IEA Ministerial Forum be held?
answers: The Singapore-IEA Ministerial Forum will be held on 24 October 2023 at the 16th Singapore International Energy Week.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What is the main objective of the Singapore International Energy Week?
answers: The main objective of the Singapore International Energy Week is to bring together global energy stakeholders to discuss and collaborate on energy-related issues.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: How can regional power grids contribute to decarbonization efforts?
answers: Regional power grids can facilitate the integration of renewable energy sources and enable the sharing of clean energy across borders, thereby contributing to decarbonization efforts.

Title: EMA: b'Singapores Energy Market Authority and International Energy Agency (IEA) Collaborate to Enhance Capabilities in Regional Power Grids'
Questions: What are the potential benefits of enhanced regional power grids?
answers: Enhanced regional power grids can lead to improved energy resilience, increased energy security, and more efficient utilization of renewable energy resources.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What is the purpose of building and operating the two 340 MW Open Cycle Gas Turbine (OCGT) units in Singapore?
answers: To enhance the power system's reliability and maintain the balance between energy supply and demand.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What role do the OCGTs play in preventing supply disruptions and power system collapses?
answers: They provide fast start generation capacity to meet increasing electricity demand and replace retiring capacity.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: When are the OCGTs expected to be operational?
answers: By June 2025.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What is the primary fuel used by the OCGTs?
answers: Natural gas.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What percentage of hydrogen can the OCGTs currently use as fuel?
answers: Up to 30%.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What is the potential future percentage of hydrogen that the OCGTs can use as fuel?
answers: Potentially 100%.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: Who is responsible for building and operating the OCGTs?
answers: Meranti Power, a subsidiary of the Energy Market Authority.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What is the purpose of the OCGTs replacing retiring capacity?
answers: To provide backup capacity for future growth in electricity demand.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: Why is fast start generation capacity important?
answers: To maintain the balance between energy supply and demand and prevent power system collapses.

Title: EMA: b'Meranti Power To Build, Own and Operate Two New Open Cycle Gas Turbine Generating Units in Singapore'
Questions: What is the capacity of each of the two OCGTs?
answers: Each OCGT has a capacity of 340 MW.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: From when will all residential premises be required to have a Residual Current Circuit Breaker (RCCB) installed?
answers: From 1 July 2023.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: How long is the grace period given to homeowners to install an RCCB?
answers: Homeowners have a grace period of two years.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: What is the purpose of an RCCB?
answers: An RCCB is a safety device that cuts off electricity supply upon detecting current leakages that may cause electric shocks.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: Do most residential premises already have an RCCB installed?
answers: Most residential premises built after July 1985 already have an RCCB installed.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: How will HDB flat owners be notified to install an RCCB?
answers: The Energy Market Authority (EMA) will notify HDB flat owners.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: Will the government fully fund the installation of an RCCB for lower-income households?
answers: Yes, the government will fully fund the installation for lower-income households.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: What subsidy will the government provide for larger HDB flats and private residences without an RCCB?
answers: The government will subsidize up to 95% of the installation and rewiring costs.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: What is the potential fine for non-compliance with the RCCB requirement?
answers: Non-compliance may result in a fine of up to $5,000.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: What is the recommendation regarding testing and replacing the RCCB?
answers: Homeowners are encouraged to regularly test their RCCB and replace it if faulty.

Title: EMA: b'Residual Current Circuit Breakers Required in All Residential Premises Built Before 1985 for Greater Electrical Safety'
Questions: Where can additional information, including cost-sharing ratios and FAQs, be found?
answers: Additional information can be found in the provided annexes.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What is the purpose of the proposed centralised process by EMA?
answers: To facilitate private investments in new generation capacity.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: Why is the current commercial-driven approach considered insufficient?
answers: It may not result in sufficient generation capacity to meet demand at the system level.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What will EMA do if there is insufficient private sector interest or unsuitable proposals?
answers: EMA will step in to build the required capacity.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: When will the first Request-for-Proposal (RFP) for new generation capacity be launched?
answers: In the second half of this year.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What is the projected growth rate of system peak demand in Singapore?

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What is the projected range of system peak demand in Singapore by 2028?
answers: Between 10.1GW and 11.7GW.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: When does the consultation period for feedback on the proposed centralised process close?

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What will EMA do if projections show insufficient capacity for new generation?
answers: Conduct a Request-for-Proposal (RFP) for private sector involvement or step in to build the required capacity.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What is the objective of the Energy Market Authority (EMA)?
answers: To ensure a reliable and competitive energy market in Singapore.

Title: EMA: b'Centralised Process to Ensure Sufficient Generation Capacity'
Questions: What is the purpose of the RFP for new generation capacity?
answers: To invite private sector involvement in building new generation capacity.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: What changes have been announced at the Energy Market Authority (EMA)?
answers: Two new members have been appointed and five members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: What changes have been announced at JTC Corporation (JTC)?
answers: Three new members have been appointed and six members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: What changes have been announced at Sentosa Development Corporation (SDC)?
answers: One new member has been appointed and six members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: Who will be stepping down from the Energy Market Authority (EMA) board?
answers: The CEO of EquiVolt Pte Ltd and an Emeritus Professor from the National University of Singapore.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: Who will be stepping down from the JTC Corporation (JTC) board?
answers: The Group President & CEO of ST Engineering Ltd.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: Who will be stepping down from the Sentosa Development Corporation (SDC) board?
answers: The Vice-Chairman of SHATEC Institutes Pte Ltd.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: When will the board changes take effect?
answers: The board changes will take effect on 1 April 2023.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: How many members have been re-appointed to the Energy Market Authority (EMA) board?
answers: Five members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: How many members have been re-appointed to the JTC Corporation (JTC) board?
answers: Six members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Board Changes at Energy Market Authority, JTC Corporation and Sentosa Development Corporation'
Questions: How many members have been re-appointed to the Sentosa Development Corporation (SDC) board?
answers: Six members have been re-appointed to the board.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What is the purpose of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme (TRECS)?
answers: The purpose of TRECS was to help large consumers secure retail contracts during the global energy crisis.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: When was the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme (TRECS) introduced?
answers: TRECS was introduced in December 2021.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: Why is the Energy Market Authority (EMA) discontinuing TRECS?
answers: EMA is discontinuing TRECS because global energy prices have become less volatile and longer-term retail contracts are now available.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What is the recommendation for consumers on TRECS or Wholesale Electricity Prices (WEP)?
answers: Consumers on TRECS or WEP are encouraged to enter into retail contracts for greater price certainty.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What measures will EMA take to strengthen the foundations of the energy market?
answers: EMA will institutionalize crisis management measures, such as the Standby LNG Facility (SLF) for energy security.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What regulatory requirements will EMA tighten on electricity retailers?
answers: EMA will tighten regulatory requirements on electricity retailers.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What will EMA explore in terms of gas procurement?
answers: EMA will explore ways to centrally aggregate gas procurement for more secure and long-term contracts.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: When will the discontinuation of TRECS take effect?
answers: The discontinuation of TRECS will take effect from 1 May 2023.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What was the purpose of the Standby LNG Facility (SLF)?
answers: The purpose of the Standby LNG Facility (SLF) was to ensure energy security.

Title: EMA: b'Discontinuation of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme'
Questions: What was the purpose of the Temporary Electricity Contracting Support Scheme (TRECS)?
answers: The purpose of TRECS was to help large consumers secure retail contracts during the global energy crisis.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What milestone has the Energy Market Authority granted to Keppel Energy?
answers: Conditional Approval to import 1 GW of electricity from Cambodia into Singapore.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What is Singapore's ambition in terms of low-carbon electricity imports by 2035?
answers: To import up to 4 GW of low-carbon electricity.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What types of energy will the imported electricity from Cambodia harness?
answers: Solar energy, hydropower, and potentially wind power.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: How will the electricity be transmitted from Cambodia to Singapore?
answers: Via new subsea cables of more than 1,000 km.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What is the project supported by between Cambodia and Singapore?
answers: A Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) on Energy Cooperation.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What does the Conditional Approval allow Keppel Energy to do?
answers: Obtain necessary regulatory approvals and licenses for the project.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What are the goals of regional collaboration in this project?
answers: Enhance energy security, increase access to reliable, clean energy, and stimulate economic growth.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What is the timeline for reviewing other proposals?
answers: Before the Request for Proposal (RFP) closes in December 2023.

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: How many pairs of questions and answers are in this JSON?

Title: EMA: b'EMA Grants Conditional Approval for 1 Gigawatt (GW) of Electricity Imports from Cambodia'
Questions: What organization granted the Conditional Approval?
answers: The Energy Market Authority (EMA).

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What is the capacity of the Sembcorp Energy Storage System (ESS)?
answers: The ESS has a maximum storage capacity of 285 megawatt hour (MWh).

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: How many households can the ESS meet the electricity needs for?
answers: The ESS can meet the electricity needs of around 24,000 households for one day.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: How long did it take to commission the ESS?
answers: The ESS was commissioned in just six months, making it the fastest in the world of its size to be deployed.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What role will the ESS play in Singapore's energy transition?
answers: The ESS will support the active management of electricity supply and demand for grid stability and contribute to Singapore's transition towards cleaner energy sources.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What type of batteries are used in the ESS?
answers: The ESS uses lithium iron phosphate batteries with high energy density and fast response time.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: Where is the Sembcorp Energy Storage System located?
answers: The ESS is located on Jurong Island in Singapore.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What program is the ESS part of?
answers: The ESS is part of the Energy Market Authority's Accelerating Energy Storage for Singapore (ACCESS) program.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What is the purpose of the ACCESS program?
answers: The ACCESS program aims to accelerate the adoption of energy storage in Singapore.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: How many battery units are there in the ESS?
answers: The ESS comprises over 800 large-scale battery units.

Title: EMA: b"Southeast Asia's largest energy storage system officially opens"
Questions: What is the response time of the ESS?
answers: The ESS has a fast response time due to the use of lithium iron phosphate batteries.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the purpose of the proposed enhancements to the electricity retailer regulatory framework?
answers: The purpose is to strengthen consumer protection and ensure retailers are resilient against market volatility.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the proposed requirement for retailers' paid-up capital or tangible net worth?
answers: Retailers would be required to have a paid-up capital or tangible net worth of at least $1 million.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is one of the proposed changes regarding key appointment holders?
answers: Retailers would need to seek approval for key appointment holders.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the proposed requirement for all retailers regarding hedging?
answers: All retailers would be required to meet hedging requirements.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What aspect of consumer protection is being enhanced in the proposed changes?
answers: Consumer protection against premature termination of contracts is being enhanced.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: When will the public consultation for the proposed enhancements be open?
answers: The public consultation will be open from 1 February 2023 to 3 March 2023.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the role of the Energy Market Authority (EMA) in this context?
answers: The EMA is seeking feedback on the proposed enhancements to the electricity retailer regulatory framework.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the minimum paid-up capital or tangible net worth required for retailers?
answers: Retailers must have at least $1 million in paid-up capital or tangible net worth.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is one of the proposed requirements for retailers regarding hedging?
answers: Retailers would need to meet hedging requirements.

Title: EMA: b'Proposed Changes to Strengthen Protection for Electricity Consumers'
Questions: What is the duration of the public consultation period?
answers: The public consultation period will be from 1 February 2023 to 3 March 2023.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: What is the purpose of the Solar Forecasting Model?
answers: To anticipate solar intermittency and enhance power grid resilience.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: How far ahead can the model forecast Singapore's solar irradiance?
answers: Up to one hour ahead.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: What is the average error rate of the model's solar irradiance forecast?
answers: Lower than 10%, which is one of the lowest for solar forecasting in the tropics.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: Why is solar power generation in Singapore subject to imbalances?
answers: Due to fluctuating weather conditions.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: What does the Solar Forecasting Model enable the power system operator to do?
answers: Anticipate solar power output and take pre-emptive actions to manage solar intermittency and balance the power grid.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: What is Singapore's target solar capacity by 2030?
answers: At least 2 gigawatt-peak (GWp).

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: How will the Solar Forecasting Model enhance grid resilience and flexibility?
answers: By supporting the deployment of solar capacity and managing solar intermittency.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: What is the potential of the Solar Forecasting Model?
answers: To be scaled up and commercialized to support solar farm operations across the region.

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: When will the Energy Management System (EMS) incorporate solar generation forecasts?

Title: EMA: b'Enhancing Singapores Solar Adoption and Grid Reliability with Solar Forecasting Tools'
Questions: Who will receive the solar generation forecasts?
answers: The wholesale electricity market operator to ensure accurate dispatch schedules for power generators.
